contextId.information: This can be stated with a verbal form. AT: "I will punish all the gods of Egypt" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_abstractnouns]])
contextId.quote: I will bring punishment on all the gods of Egypt

contextId.information: This can be stated with a verbal form. AT: "All the Egyptians cried loudly" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_abstractnouns]])
contextId.quote: There was loud lamenting in Egypt
